home.altImg: Two sisters playing with pebbles in Hamam al-Alil camp, Iraq.
home.titleImg: Tom Peyre-Costa/NRC, 29th June 2021. Source: Norwegia Refugee Council.
home.headerTwo: Help Refugees Alliance is a digital platform that counts with a database of volunteers worldwide willing to offer refugees a new home.
infoBox: According to the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR), at mid-2022 103 million people were forcibly displaced worldwide â€” 32.5 million are refugees.
UNHCR also estimates that between 2018 and 2021 an average of between 350,000 and 400,000 children were born into a refugee life per year.
